titleStmt.title: The manner of raising, ordering, and improving forrest-trees also, how to plant, make and keep woods, walks, avenues, lawns, hedges, &c. : with several figures proper for avenues and walks to end in, and convenient figures for lawns : also rules by M. Cook.
titleStmt.author: Cook, Moses.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
